name: The QMoDA Artist Grant, 2023
metadata:
{"name": "The QMoDA Artist Grant, 2023 1", "description": "Dedicated to the safety and success of Trans and Queer artists worldwide.
--
You can think of this free mint as the flyer you pick up in the museum lobby. Something you can return to in the future and know "I was there."

---
Trans and Queer artists are historically underrepresented and underfunded. This often means that artists must put their passions on hold to work jobs that donb�t fulfill them artistically in order to survive. 

In the spirit of mutual aid, The QMoDA Artist Grant aims to push back against this injustice by providing artists with capital to pursue their passions. 

Funded by a donation by Zora Labs, QMoDA awarded merit-based ETH grants to artists around the globe. The 10 artists, named in the flyer here, are invited to create an original work and release it as an NFT edition.

One edition from each artist will be held permanently in the QMoDA vault, and the Zora vault, respectively. 

---


 b9 10 artists, 10 editions, 10 ETH in funding

b Learn more about the program and find a summary of the artists' mints by visiting [www.qmoda.art](https://qmoda.art/grant-landing-page)
